CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Alkylation of the thiophene ring was carried out by Kumada coupling , yielding 3-alkylthiophene as a colorless oil or a white solid ( 6-9 ).

Let's think step by step.

1. Thiophene ring: This is a heterocyclic compound with the ring structure being a five-membered ring containing one sulfur atom and four carbon atoms. It is the material that undergoes alkylation in the paragraph.

2. 3-alkylthiophene: This is the product of the alkylation reaction. It is described as a colorless oil or a white solid. The "3-alkyl" part refers to the presence of an alkyl group attached to the third carbon position of the thiophene ring.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Alkylation of the thiophene ring was carried out by Kumada coupling , yielding 3-alkylthiophene as a colorless oil or a white solid ( 6-9 ).

Let's think step by step.

1. Thiophene ring
2. Alkylation
3. Kumada coupling
4. 3-alkylthiophene
5. Colorless oil
6. White solid.

These are the property names identified in the paragraph. The first three are chemical reactions or processes, while the last three are the resulting products.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. 3-alkylthiophene
2. colorless oil
3. white solid.

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material properties. The first entity, "3-alkylthiophene," is the material that undergoes a chemical reaction and can exist in two different forms as described by the last two entities. The last two entities describe the appearance of the material in its different forms.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| 3-alkylthiophene |
| colorless oil |
| white solid |

Paragraph: Alkylation of the thiophene ring was carried out by Kumada coupling , yielding 3-alkylthiophene as a colorless oil or a white solid ( 6-9 ).

1. Thiophene ring
2. Alkylation of the thiophene ring
3. Kumada coupling
4. 3-alkylthiophene
5. Colorless oil
6. White solid
6-9 (These numbers are referencing the figure or diagram, not properties, so they are not considered entities in this context.)

1. 3-alkylthiophene
2. Colorless oil
3. White solid

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material properties. The other entities are not properties but rather processes or reactions.

| 3-alkylthiophene (as a colorless oil or a white solid) |

This table presents the entities that refer to material properties, with the exact wording from the original paragraph. The first row, "Property Value," is a header indicating the type of information in the column. The second row, "3-alkylthiophene (as a colorless oil or a white solid)," is the property value.
